suggest.meta_keywords: Azion Edge Functions, Edge Firewall, JavaScript security, Web APIs, network lists, Firewall Rules Engine, Edge Computing Platform, request manipulation, metadata APIs, GeoIP logic
suggest.meta_description: Explore how Azion Edge Functions and Edge Firewall enhance security using JavaScript, APIs for network lists and metadata handling, deployed on an Edge Computing Platform.

current.meta_description: Through Edge Functions, you can write your own security source code in JavaScript and deploy it to run at the edge of the network.
